Segment.name: GH
Segment.comment: To indicate the list identity for the details following

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: NumberOfLineItems
Field.comment: Total number of line items in the transaction set

Field.name: RevisionNumber
Field.comment: A number which indicates the chronological sequence of revisions and updates to a ratemaking docket
